results.p: Jul 10, 2019 — Pop-under is a window that opens behind the active program window on a computer screen. For example, a user may be viewing a web page using an Internet browser.

results.p: An ad that displays in a new browser window behind the current browser window. Information The pop-under ad is the sneakier relative of the pop-up ad.
